readable.content: A woman applies face paint while a boy with a Mohawk holds a mirror . A woman painting her face while a child with a Mohawk holds a mirror . A woman painting on makeup . A woman paints her face while a boy with a Mohawk holds her mirror . Child with Mohawk haircut holding mirror for woman putting on face paint .
